attributes.action: To ensure that Donald Trump is welcomed to the UK.
attributes.additional_details: The recent uproar about America placing a ban on cetain immigrants entering the USA is entirely a matter for them to decide. We should not risk damaging our relationship with America. America has every right to decide who enters their country.
attributes.background: America has every right to decide who enters their country in order to protect their people. We should not risk damaging our relationship with America by banning Donald Trump.
